vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.18; his mother was Hammolecheth (H4447);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044H) and Mahlah (H4244H)
§ Ishod = "man of majesty"
a Manassite from east of the Jordan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Hamoléquet; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伊施荷 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "威嚴的人"
屬約旦河東的半瑪拿西支派的人 (代上 7:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伊施荷 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "威严的人"
属约旦河东的半玛拿西支派的人 (代上 7:18)
